course.subject: FINA
course.name: Wealth Management
course.description: With an introduction to the principles of wealth management and the financial planning process, this course progresses to cover various wealth management topics including consumption planning, investment planning and retirement planning. In particular, this course emphasizes on the provision of investment advisory services. It discusses client expectations and concerns including risk and other cognitive issues before applying the concepts and techniques to construct and manage investment portfolios for individual clients.
course.prerequisites: FINA 5120 AND FINA 5210
